item.title: Fed by Abel & Cole
item.description: My client, Cogworks, was engaged by Abel & Cole to build an eCommerce platform to bring their organic, sustainable food delivery service to life. Together, we built a fast, responsive Umbraco website, with eCommerce functionality provided by Merchello to handle their product catalog. The system allowed customers to set up regular and one-off orders of Abel & Cole's delicious organic food range. We built a custom REST web API to sync product, order and delivery information between the website and the client's fulfillment systems.
